short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and download all images on a web page with Image downloader.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1.Dynamically obtain the common image formats supported by all image resources on the current page.
2.Support single picture or batch download function.
3.Supports two-column and single-column layouts.
4.You can set the image to be compressed when downloading.
5.The downloading process can support the function of removing the image watermark.
6.Rich functions such as online editing of pictures
